content.raw:
I'm getting test failures for INTEGRATION_gpu_laser and INTEGRATION_heightmap on quantal with ogre 1.7.4:
~~~
[ RUN      ] GPURaySensorTest.Heightmap
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.187
INTEGRATION_gpu_laser: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:424: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::UserCamera]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffd7fff700 (LWP 26857)]
0x00007ffff4723425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
64	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
...
#3  0x00007ffff471c192 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7ffff6fcaeac "px != 0", 
    file=0x7ffff6fcae80 "/usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp", line=424, 
    function=0x7ffff6fd7360 <_ZZNK5boost10shared_ptrIN6gazebo9rendering10UserCameraEEptEvE19__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::UserCamera]") at assert.c:103
#4  0x00007ffff6efe5da in boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::rendering::UserCamera>::operator-> (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:424
#5  0x00007ffff6f460e7 in gazebo::rendering::Heightmap::Load (this=this@entry=0x7fffd242e7b0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc:324
...
~~~
content.html:
I'm getting test failures for INTEGRATION_gpu_laser and INTEGRATION_heightmap on quantal with ogre 1.7.4:

[ RUN      ] GPURaySensorTest.Heightmap
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.187
INTEGRATION_gpu_laser: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:424: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::UserCamera]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffd7fff700 (LWP 26857)]

(gdb) bt
...
